official_title: A resolution calling upon the United States Postal Service to designate Houston main post office building in Houston, Texas as the "Barbara C. Jordan Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the Houston Main Post Office Building in Houston, Texas, as the Barbara C. Jordan Post Office Building.
